headline: Broadcom, M&T Bank, Coherent: The latest analyst calls
summary: HSBC analysts initiated coverage of chipmaker Broadcom (AVGO) with a Hold rating and a price target of $160 per share. M&T Bank (MTB) was downgraded to Neutral from Overweight by JPMorgan, citing no general catalysts for outperformance. Coherent Corp. (COHR) was given a Buy rating and $135 price target by Jefferies analysts, who initiated coverage with optimism around new CEO Jim Anderson's restructuring plans. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here. This post was written by Luke Carberry Mogan.

Coherent Corp. (COHR) was given a Buy rating and $135 price target by Jefferies analysts, who initiated coverage with optimism around new CEO Jim Anderson's restructuring plans.
